author: PR.com
title: Royal Marmin Bay Boutique & Art Hotel Opened Its Doors
text:
Royal Marmin Bay Boutique & Art Hotel Opened Its Doors
The first energy efficient, ecologically green hotel in Greece, opened its doors this year (June 2015), and invites you to experience unique moments in a safe, non-toxic environment where sustainability meets luxury.
Elounda, Greece, July 08, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Overlooking the famous Mirabello Bay in Elounda Crete, architecturally blended with the natural environment, Royal Marmin Bay is the ideal five-star choice for those in quest of relaxation away from their daily routine.
Luxurious and glamorous facilities have been completely renovated to accommodate couples or families. Take advantage of an attentive architecture and elegant design that will surely make your stay unforgettable.
The five different types of luxury rooms with private pools, the beautifully decorated and relaxing environment of the Euphoria Spa, the excellent facilities and the wonderful restaurants and bars of Royal Marmin Bay, are only a few reasons for you to choose a unique holiday experience.
About Royal Marmin Bay Boutique & Art Hotel:
Royal Marmin Bay Boutique & Art Hotel provides all the services and amenities that guests would expect from a hotel of this class. It offers five luxurious room types, 15 private pools and 1 large main pool, two restaurants, three bars and a traditional caf√©, lots of activities and spectacular views to Mirabello bay.
